app.layout
app.tree_update(upload)

Loads a chosen jpt Tree and Refresehs to home page if it dosnt load nothing happens (Empty page default back to home)

Parameters

upload – the Paramter Dash generats from chosen a File

Returns

if the Tree was Changed and which page to load
